archimate:Requirement.name: SG.1.3.3c: c) specify the organisation's risk appetite for each risk category, expressed as the maximum combination of likelihood and impact, or frequency and loss, that it is willing to accept
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
